name: Space Treasure Hunters #1
description:
After the Third Galactic war, many worlds were left in ruins. In these ruins remained treasures of inestimable value. Hundreds of treasure hunters are crisscrossing the Galaxy. One of them is David Fox - and it seems that he finally got lucky...

Discover clues that the famous treasure hunter left in the Space restaurant. Go to the place where the greatest treasure of all time is hidden and get it for yourself!

Entirely in English, Czech and other languages
Completely free of charge
Classic point and click adventure game optimized for tablets and smartphones
SuperHelp for quick help in the game
AutoSave feature saves your positions

Hint: In the menu you can get information about any location, you'll also find all collected items there and you can turn the sounds on/off or restart the game.

>>>
Czech - Česky: Kompletně česky, point-and-click adventure hra: Lovci vesmírných pokladů #1. Dobrodružství Davida Foxe ve vesmíru.
